metadata.name: Cataclysm
metadata.description:
In "Brave New World", the theme is centered around the feeling of being caught between two worlds: The natural, raw and untamed, and the technological, which has advanced rapidly in these recent years.

It deals with the daily conflict of spending enough time outdoors, while striving to keep up to date with ever-evolving tech.

Through these images, I am trying to synthesize my emotions about our future on earth, the challenges of the next generation, and the concern about our planet.

》If the bid reaches 0.1 Ξ the owner will receive a high-quality C-Type physical print up to 24" x 24".
